price: Amewafanya miungu wote kuwa ni Mungu Mmoja tu? Hakika hili ni jambo la ajabu.
arabic: أَجَعَلَ ٱلۡأٓلِهَةَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدًاۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٌ عُجَابٞ
footnotes: Ati amewafanya miungu yote kuwa ni Mungu mmoja tu! Ama hakika jambo hili ni la ajabu, mwisho wa kustaajabisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ajaʿala al-ālihata ilāhan wāḥidan inna hādhā lashayon ʿujābun
